text: Giovanna Schettino (born 26 February 1998) is an Italian lightweight rower world champion at senior level at the World Rowing Championships. ==Biography== Schettino started the activity in 2012, having her senior debut in 2017. In addition to the international medal won at a senior level, at the youth level she won four more medals between world and European championships. ==Achievements== {| class="wikitable" width=60% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Venue !!Rank!!Event!!Time!!Notes |- |rowspan=1|2017 |align=left|World Championships |align=left| Sarasota |bgcolor=gold|1st |Lightweight quadruple sculls |6:33.97 | |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female rowers Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for Italy
title: Giovanna Schettino
